Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory117.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Lee, I can feel the virus' logical contamination of the control system weakening.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Is that good?', 3: '6', 4: "What's wrong?", 5: '6'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "It could be due to the space station's expelling action.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Good, the electromagnetic lock is still functioning. This is an old system, so it shouldn't be too difficult to manually change the parameters.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'If we can infiltrate the main system...', 3: '9'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Liv, how long can you stay in hacking mode?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'About three minutes...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "That's not enough. It takes at least five from changing the parameters and initialization till the lock is up and running.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Count us in. We should be able to buy you more time.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I'd think so too.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "If that's the case, Watanabe needs to give me permission to connect to his frame...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Babylonia and the Forsaken are still hostile toward each other. This may put Liv in an awkward situation—', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Don't expect us to hide your secrets.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "This Construct was built by Babylonia in the first place. I've got nothing to hide.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'As for my consciousness...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: '—I expected good manners from Gray Raven. Right? Commandant of Gray Raven.', 4: '2'}
{2: "We don't have to do that.", 3: '32', 4: 'Of course.', 5: '32'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant, is this okay?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Let's do it then.", 3: '38', 4: 'Well, nothing bad will come out of this.', 5: '38'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Let's do it then.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'If there is any danger, Commandant, please wake us immediately.', 4: '1'}
